channel.title: Dioxane on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Dioxane on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: The 3d Ann Arbor Civic Tech meetup - a writeup
item.description: We had a good time and a lively discussion at the 3d Ann Arbor Civic Technology meetup. There were about 18 people in attendance, including the City of Ann Arbor CFO/CIO, the webmaster from Washtenaw County, several U of Michigan SI students, some townies, a fellow who drove down from Lansing who had organized Code Michigan hackathon, and a number of folks who were drawn in from Meetup. (who did I miss)

item.title: Scio Residents for Safe Water and the Pall/Gelman dioxane plume
item.description:
Scio Residents for Safe Water will be at the Ann Arbor Green Fair on Friday, June 13, 2008. They have been tracking the dioxane contamination associated with the Pall/Gelman site - see map above, which links to the Washtenaw County government PDF.
Previous discussion on this on Vacuum from 2004, and it's not getting any better.
